subject: Football
Football (College)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Huskies kept the game close into the second half behind running back Bishop Sankey, but Marcus Mariota and the Ducks ran away at the end for their 10th straight win in the schools’ rivalry.
snippet: The Huskies kept the game close into the second half behind running back Bishop Sankey, but Marcus Mariota and the Ducks ran away at the end for their 10th straight win in the schools’ rivalry.
